author: fabiocos
body: Test of TMVA with doubled xmlenginebuffersize for large xml file parsing, suggested as possible solution to the problem discussed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/26154 . This follow the comment https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/26154#issuecomment-472343434 and subsequent discussion.
title: Double the TMVA xmlenginebuffersize to test large file parsing
